argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | inveq.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | inveq.h | |- H = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 3 |  | inveq.n | |- N = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 4 |  | inveq.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 5 |  | inveq.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | inveq.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Sect ` C ) = ( Sect ` C ) |
| 8 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) ) -> C e. Cat ) |
| 9 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) ) -> Y e. B ) |
| 10 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) ) -> X e. B ) |
| 11 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_isinv | |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) G <-> ( F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) G /\ G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) G /\ G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) -> G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) G -> G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_com12 | |- ( F ( X N Y ) G -> ( ph -> G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) -> ( ph -> G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_impcom | |- ( ( ph /\ ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) ) -> G ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) |
| 17 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_isinv | |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) K <-> ( F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) K /\ K ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) K /\ K ( Y ( Sect ` C ) X ) F ) -> F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) K ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) K -> F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) K ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_adantld | |- ( ph -> ( ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) -> F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) K ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ph /\ ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) ) -> F ( X ( Sect ` C ) Y ) K ) |
| 22 | 1, 7, 8, 9, 10, 16, 21 | #P_sectcan | |- ( ( ph /\ ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) ) -> G = K ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_ex | |- ( ph -> ( ( F ( X N Y ) G /\ F ( X N Y ) K ) -> G = K ) ) |
